title: OPEC Outlook Supports Crude, Vitality Rewards for Insured, The Business of Equality
itunes:title: OPEC Outlook Supports Crude, Vitality Rewards for Insured, The Business of Equality
description:
Carol speaks to Tamar Essner, Lead Energy Analyst at Nasdaq, and Fernando Valle, Bloomberg Intelligence Oil Analyst, on the oil rally and a preview of the upcoming OPEC meeting.  Brooks Tingle, President & CEO at John Hancock Insurance, discusses supporting customer's well-being through the Vitality HealthyMind program. Jaylani Hussein, Executive Director of CAIR, discusses working with Amazon to accommodate Muslim employees in Minnesota. And we Drive to the Close with Carol Schleif, Deputy Chief Investment Officer at Abbot Downing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
